name: Arboria (itch)
description:
Arboria is a game creation tool that emphasizes creativity and exploration, as well as the ability to easily share your games with friends and the larger Arboria community. It's a magical world where you can grow your own game.

Levels are designed from a top-down 2D perspective but played in first person 3D. You can create puzzles, adventure games, narrative worlds, musical worlds, and more. It is being developed for IOS and Android.

Team:

CS Wallace: Producer
Ivy Li: Art Director
Sam Von Ehren: Engine programmer
Jonathan Moormann: UI Programmer
Reynaldo Vargas: Educational Advisor
